verses.content: Chun, thlivira inthawkin LALPA chun Job chu a hung dawn a, a hril tah a:
“Hrietna bo thuhaia, Thurâwn sukthimtu hi tu am a ni leh?
Pasal angin tuhin i dier kei la, Thu indawn ka ti cheh a, i mi hrilfie ding a nih.
Hnuoi lungphûmhai ka phûm laiin nang chu khaw lai am i um a? Hriethiemna i nei chun mi hril rawh.
Tuin am chu chu lienziehai chu a riruong a, I hriet ngei maw! Annawleh, a chunga chun tuin am a thlûr chu a siem a?
A lungphûmhai chu khâwlai am an innghat a na? Annawleh, a kia lung chu tuin am a phûm a?
Zîng arasihai chun hla an sak tâwlin, Pathien naupahai chu iengtik khan am hlimin an khêk a?
Annawleh, sula inthawka a hung ṭe thla laiin, Tuisuoriet chu tuin am kawtkhârhai chu a khârpêk a;
Sûm chu a silfênah ka siem a, Inthim sâmupa ka tuom lai khan;
A ramrihai ka ruotpêk a, Kawtkhârhai le palhai ka sie a;
‘Hi chen hi nang hung la, khêl naw la, I tuifâwn chapotakhai chu hi chen hin châwl an tih’ ka ti lai khan?
“I nihai inṭana inthawk ta hrimin, zîngkâr dâm hi thu i pêk ta hlakin, Vârṭien chu a hun hre dingin în umtir ta hlak am,
Hnuoi inkhumna chu hlîm ding le, A sûnga mi rilo chu sêpdawka a um theina dingin?
Namna hnuoia pilpawk angin sukdanglamin a um a, Silfên angin piengzie a hung nei a.
Mi riloa inthawkin an var chu cheltângin a um a, Kut insâng khawm chu sukthliekin a um bawk a.
Tuisuoriet hnârahai chun i lût ta hlak am? Annawleh, li inthûk rila chun i fe ta hlak am?
Thina kawtkhârhai chu i kuomah suklang a ni ta hlak am? Annawleh, thina hlim kawtkhârhai chu i hmu hlak am?
Hnuoi khang lienzie chu i hriet ta hlak am? Hril rawh khai, a rênga i hriet vawng chun.
Var umna hmun lampui chu khâwlai am a na? Inthimna hi teh, a umna hmun khâwlai am a na?
Chutaka chun i va fe ding ni ta sienla, Chutaka in chu i va thlierhran ding ni ta sienla?
I hriet ngei maw, nang chu i pieng dai tah a, I nihai khawm a hung tam ta êm a!
Vûr intling khâwmnahaia chun i lût ta hlak am? Annawleh, riel intling khâwmnahai chu i hmu ta hlak am?
Chuong buoina huna dinga ka khêkhai le, Indona le intukna nia dinga ka khêkhai chu?
Ieng lampui âm var hi a fein, Annawleh, hnuoi chunga hin ieng lampui âm sak thli hi a hrâng hlak a?
“Tuin am tuilien ta dinga ruom le, Ṭêk ta ding a lampui a siem a?
Mi um nawna ram le, Mi um nawna thlalêra ruo insûrtir ding le.
Leihnuoi râusan ta le, se ta chu sukkhawp ding le, Hlohna innêm chu hung inmâwngtir dingin?
Ruo hin pa a nei am? Annawleh, daidaw malhai hi tuin am a hung thlâk a na?
Tu phîng sûnga inthawkin am vûr chu a hung pieng a na? Vâna inthawka vûrsûr inphi sung sung chu tuin am ân pieng tir leh?
Tuihai chu lung angin a ngar a, Li inthûk chungzâwl chu sukkhalin a um tah a.
Siruk inbâwr chu nangin khuop thei i ti? Sizucho khuopnahai chu i sût thei ding am a nih?
Mazzaroth chu an hun sengah i hung ṭhuoi suok thei ding maw? Annawleh, Zângkhuohai i ṭhuoi thei ding maw?
Vânhaia thuruothai chu i hriet vawng am? Hnuoi chunga hin thu în neitir thei ding am a nih?
“Sûmhai chu i râwlin ko thei i ti, Ruopui vânâwnin a sûrkhumna ding chein?
Kâwlinlephai chu an feh a, ‘Hitaka hin kan um,’ i kuoma ti dingin, I tir suok thei ding am a nih?
Sûngril bung hranhaia chun tuin am varna a sieh a? Annawleh, lungvara hrietna chu tuin am a pêk a?
Varna ngawtin tuin am sûmhai chu a tiem sêng a? Vâna penghai chu tuin am bunthla thei a ta?
Iengtik âm pilvut chu an hung inhlawmin, A hlawmhai chu an hung inchâr tlat a?
Sakeibakneipui chu a safâk ding i zawngpêk ding am a nih? Annawleh, sakeibaknei vânglai phîngṭâm chu i sukkhawp thei am a nih?
An pûk sûnga chun an bawk a, An kuoahai chun an inchân hlak laiin?
A têhai chu Pathien kuomah an khêk a, Fâk ding tlasama an umin Vaâk chu tuin am fâk ding a pêk a?
